'''Troubled Lianne''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that only appears during the {{Quest|Lianne's Troubles}}.

==Profile==
Lianne is a woman often encountered searching for materials in the wild. It is unknown what she uses the items for, or why she forages in the wilderness rather than buying them in [[Mondstadt City]].

===Appearance===
She has straight brown hair and brown eyes, and wears a red-and-white corset dress with dark red accents on the sleeves. She wears a dark red bracelet on each wrist, a dark red fabric choker necklace, long black stockings, and red heels.
